ygData.subject: Re: Tyrael/Wolfenstein
ygData.msgSnippet: Inferno begun to run away from the base There are too many! Quickstrike also made a run for it Darn turrents, Next time we will have it out for real

Inferno begun to run away from the base "There are too many!" 

Quickstrike also made a run for it "Darn turrents, Next time we will
have it out for real Tripredics!" he yelled.

"Oh sure, everyone forget about Waspinator, Waspinator just-"
Waspinator's head said bouncing away, but was cut off when a laser hit
next to it causing the ground to explode sending him flew through the
air out of site.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Vlad Ward felt he had chosen her right as the unknown bot again proved 
> her warrior abilities. He didn't marvel for long at this, though, as 
> the three plasma shots came at him. He dodged one, barely, but not the 
> second and third. One of his two missile racks was destroyed by the 
> attack, and he was spun to the ground. He sttod up and fired in 
> Wolfenstein's legs with his pulse lasers.
> 
> Elsewhere, Proto had successfully taken grip of Tyrael's arm and was 
> mauling it. Tyrael, however, did not consider this a tragedy. He 
> turned off the two turrets from Megastorm and directed them at any 
> enemy, basically Inferno and Quickstrike.
> 
> Tyrael: Megastorm? Is that you?! Haha! You have changed! As for what 
> to do... FIGHT FOR THE CAUSE'S SAKE! FIGHT THEM ALL OFF!
> 
> He swiftly took a light shard and cut his own arm just above where 
> Proto was. The bleeding consisted of a massive surge of energon and 
> energy. It would at the very least fry some of Proto's liquid 
> circuits.
> 
> Tyrael: ONWARD, TRIPREDACUS! OFFER NO PITY TO THE ENEMIES!
> 
> He fired four small blasts at Proto.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Airshadow Nightstar" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > ????::
> > 
> > The dragon femme moved close to Tyrael with the purpose of cover his 
> back. 
> > When she took her position she aimed and opened fire against 
> Skullentron.
> > 
> > 
> > >From: "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >Subject: Tyrael/Wolfenstein
> > >Date: Tue, 03 Sep 2002 22:19:29 -0000
> > >
> > >Tyrael managed to take flight and thus avoiding some of the major
> > >shots. Seeing another shot coming from a large tank that had just
> > >arrived, he rises higher and avoids the large blast that could have
> > >blown him down. The smaller shots however did get to him, and his 
> leg
> > >was getting weak. He wouldn't be able to use that talon for some
> > >times.
> > >
> > >He saw that Skulletron was trying to coordinate with Wolfenstein, 
> and
> > >the tank's arrival made things more complicated. A plan formed in 
> his
> > >head.
> > >
> > >He directed two turrets to concentrate fire on the new bot and 
> follow
> > >it. They both unleashed a hellfire of laser beams at him.
> > >
> > >Tyrael: Khan Vlad! Forward and do not stop! We drive them back now!
> > >
> > >Vlad: Are you certain, Major?
> > >
> > >The Clanner looked around. The brunt of the enemy opposition was
> > >situated on a northeastern frontline from the base. Inferno and
> > >Quickstrike were near, but the base defenses could handle the pair.
> > >
> > >Vlad: I see... (He turned to Inferno) I withdraw my claim on you as 
> my
> > >opponent. Forward Tyrael!
> > >
> > >He turned to Wolfenstein, transformed then used his medium laser on
> > >the hairy bot.
> > >
> > >At the same moment, Tyrael let go another volley of needles on
> > >Skulletron, dived down and slashed twice at him with his 
> razor-sharp
> > >feathers.
> > >
> > >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Eric Bischoff" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > > : : Skulletron : :
> > > >
> > > > Skulletron nods, then he points to Tyrael.
> > > >
> > > > Skulletron:  That's the bot in charge of the Tripreds.  I need 
> you
> > >to go and take his attention, but try not to get hurt.  And please,
> > >try to resist aggression, or else this will be harder for me.  Can 
> you
> > >do that, comrade?
> > >
> > 
> >
